newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian rupee little moved by RBI dollar purchases.
newsitem.headline: Indian rupee little moved by RBI dollar purchases.

text.p: The rupee was trading at 35.74/75 against the dollar at noon Monday, little affected by Reserve Bank of India (RBI) intervention, dealers said.
"RBI bought at 35.7550 level," said a bank dealer.
RBI bought from the spot market unlike its forward dollar purchases on Friday, dealers said.
The rupee traded at a high of 35.7375 and a low of 35.77 on Monday after opening the day at a wide quote of 35.77/79.
Forward premiums opened lower and were steady in quiet trade, dealers said.
